alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 6:11AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Meriwether, Troup and northwestern Harris Counties through 645 AM EST... At 610 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Abbottsford to near Denson, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Hogansville, Lone Oak, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Piedmont Heights, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine Lake, Long Cane and Saint Marks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
